title: Subchapter B - Low-income Housing Tax Credit Program
content:
Subchapter B - Low-income Housing Tax Credit Program

State Regulations

Part 2040 - Low-income Housing Credit Qualified Allocation Plan (ยง 2040.1 to 2040.15)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Part 2040 - Low-income Housing Tax Credit Program (ยง 2040.1 to 2040.15)
